levelList.name: Aleteo
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP
[BeforeAttack] Deal 5% HP damage to at most 5 random other allies
- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Heal self by 10% of damage dealt
[OnSucceedAttackTail] Inflict 1~4 [Laceration]

levelList.name: Aleteo
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. -2) Atk Weight (max 1)</style>
[BeforeAttack] Deal 5% HP damage to at most 5 random other allies
- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)
<style="highlight">[EndSkill] If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, gain (excess heal/max HP) x 10 Offense Level Up next turn. (max 3 per turn)</style>
